alert.note: Alert for Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 2:44PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marengo County through 330 PM CDT... At 244 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pin Hook, or near Linden, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Linden, Jefferson, Thomaston, Myrtlewood, Dayton, Freddie Jones Field, Pin Hook, Consul, Magnolia, Chickasaw State Park, Old Spring Hill, Octagon and Calvary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
